name: Swords and Souls: Neverseen
detailed_description:
Swords & Souls: Neverseen is a single player RPG which focuses on active time combat and an addictive character progression based on your own skill! From humble beginnings in a quiet seaside town, set out to explore the wild, untamed world of Neverseen! Go up against orcs, goblins, golems and more in combat where you must block, dodge, and counter in real time. Master your abilities through fun and addictive minigames that evolve as you play. When you need a break from scouring the map for secrets and enemies, return to the Haven, where you can relax with fishing, improve your home, find a loyal pet or companion, or maybe even... true love? It's up to you!

Key Features:

  • Master a dynamic combat system which involves stats, timing, and thinking.
  • Engage in skill-based training mini-games that reward your efforts and mastery.
  • Design your hero and customize them with tons of equipment and abilities.
  • Journey through dozens of encounters and locations, including an endgame arena.
  • Enhance your town and home with upgrades to improve both looks and stats.
  • Train pets, fill a museum, get trophies, discover secrets, and more...
